contentList.content: Rage

Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Killing blows and <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> will reset the duration of your Rage.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Rage blocks the ability to both cast and <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentrate</LSTag> on Spells.
Rage

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
End Rage
Manually end your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag>.
Reckless Attack

Make all Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. However, enemies will also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against you. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Reckless Attack

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, however enemies also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against it.
Reckless Assault

Make all Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Additionally, reduce the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by one. However, enemies will also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against you. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Reckless Assault

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, however enemies also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against it. The number this creature needs in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by one.
Reckless Rampage

Make all Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Additionally, reduce the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by one, and when rolling a Critical Hit, roll an additional damage die. However, enemies will also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against you. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Reckless Rampage

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, however enemies also have Advantage when making Attack Rolls against it. The number this creature needs in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by one. When rolling a Critical Hit, this creature also rolls an additional damage die.
Intimidated

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. It must run from the source of its intimidation, and can't take any additional actions.
Intimidation Immunity
Affected creature cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidated</LSTag>.
Beastheart
Rage: Bestial Heart
A primal anger lingers within your mind, and beasthood threatens to take hold. You gain access to five Bestial Hearts, each of which have unique passive benefits.
Rage: Bestial Heart
Enter a blind fury which channels the ferocity of five Bestial Hearts.
Rage: Bear Heart

Enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_BEAR">Rage</LSTag> which channels the durability of nature. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Rage: Bear Heart

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to all forms of damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
Natural Tank
Present yourself as a easy target for all nearby enemies, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TAUNTED">Goading</LSTag> them in the process.
Goaded
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when not attacking the creature who goaded them.
Goaded Immunity
Affected creature cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TAUNTED">Goaded</LSTag>.
Rage: Eagle Heart

Enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_EAGLE">Rage</LSTag> which channels the freedom of the winds. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly_Spell">Fly</LSTag>.
Rage: Eagle Heart

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

Due to the nature of its Rage, this creature possesses the ability to Fly.
Diving Strike
Leap down unto a foe from above, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. You do not take damage from falling while using this action.
Rage: Elk Heart

Enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_ELK">Rage</LSTag> which channels the speed of the wild. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Rage: Elk Heart

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

Due to the nature of its Rage, this creature can Dash as a Bonus Action.
Primal Stampede
Charge forward, running through all enemies in the way and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Rage: Tiger Heart

Enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_TIGER">Rage</LSTag> which channels the ruthlessness of survival. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, when dealing damage to a creature, you may potentially cause them to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Tiger's Bloodletting
When dealing damage to a creature, you may potentially cause them to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Rage: Tiger Heart

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

Due to the nature of its Rage, when this creature deals damage, their target may potentially begin to Bleed.
Tiger's Bloodlust
Lash out at surrounding enemies.
Rage: Wolf Heart

Enter a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Rage</LSTag> which channels the camaraderie of the hunt. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, grant <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> to all allied <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> within [1].
Rage: Wolf Heart

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

Due to the nature of its Rage, this creature grants Advantage on all allied Attack Rolls within [2].
Rage: Wolf Heart's Prey

Affected creature is standing near a Raging Wolf Heart Barbarian.

The Barbarian's allies roll with Advantage against this creature when making Melee Weapon Attacks.
Inciting Howl
Each ally within earshot has their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> doubled during their next turn.
Inciting Howl
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is doubled.
Call of the Wild
Each of your five <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Hearts</LSTag> now grant a unique action while enraged.
Bestial Dominance

Upon enraging under one of your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Hearts</LSTag>, you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Dominate</LSTag> all Beasts and Monstrosities within [1] of you.
Howl of the Wild

Each unique action granted by <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CalloftheWild">Call of the Wild</LSTag> may now be used with any <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Heart</LSTag>.
Bestial Growth

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while enraged under your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Hearts</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increases by 1.
Totemic Rage
While enraged, allies within [1] of you benefit from the passive effects of your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Hearts</LSTag>.
Totemic Rage: Bear
Affected creature is benefiting from the effects of an allied Barbarian's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Bear Heart</LSTag>.
Totemic Rage: Eagle
Affected creature is benefiting from the effects of an allied Barbarian's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Eagle Heart</LSTag>.
Totemic Rage: Elk
Affected creature is benefiting from the effects of an allied Barbarian's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Elk Heart</LSTag>.
Totemic Rage: Tiger
Affected creature is benefiting from the effects of an allied Barbarian's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Tiger Heart</LSTag>.
Totemic Rage: Wolf
Affected creature is benefiting from the effects of an allied Barbarian's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_TOTEM_WOLF">Wolf Heart</LSTag>.
Wildheart
Affected creature may swap their <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage_Totem_Container">Bestial Heart</LSTag> as a free action.
Rage: Frenzy
An uncontrollable ferocity threatens to overtake you, boiling over with pure malice. You gain access to a Frenzy with which to lay bare your pure, destructive wrath.
Rage: Frenzy

Lose yourself in anger, giving in to a total <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY">Frenzy</LSTag>! Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures.
Rage: Frenzy

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
Frenzied Throw

As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, throw a character or item from the world or your inventory. Upon doing so, you will receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY_BURNOUT">Frenzied Strain</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> affects how much weight you can throw. Heavier items deal more damage. The damage of <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown Weapons</LSTag> is the same as the weapon's melee damage.
Frenzied Strain
Using Frenzied actions adds a stacking -1 penalty to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>. Killing blows will reset your strain.
Frenzied Strike

As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, make a melee attack with your equipped weapon. Upon doing so, you will receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY_BURNOUT">Frenzied Strain</LSTag>.
Steelbreaker
When dealing damage, you ignore all <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Feral Instinct
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY">Frenzied</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is doubled.
Thrill of the Kill
Upon landing a killing blow while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY">Frenzied</LSTag>, immediately restore your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Let It Rip

Once per turn, your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FrenziedStrike">Frenzied Strike</LSTag> will deal the maximum damage possible. This effect is reset upon triggering <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ThrilloftheKill">Thrill of the Kill</LSTag>.
Frostbreaker
Amidst frigid hilltops and glacial peaks, you have honed your rage, now controlled and enduring.
Rage: Frostbreaker
Enrage, wreathing yourself in the frigid air where you once tempered your animosity.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all physical damage, <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Cold damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Rage: Frostbreaker

Affected creature deals an additional [1] Cold damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, Immunity to Cold damage, and Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
Bifrost

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> no longer slows you, and are incapable of slipping on ice. In addition, dealing damage to enemies while enraged will afflict enemies with one turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROSTBITE">Frigidity</LSTag>.
Frigid Omen

Upon dealing damage to enemies with a melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> while enraged, a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_RayOfFrost">Ray of Frost</LSTag> will fire toward another enemy within [1] of your target.
Frostfields
When dealing damage to an enemy while enraged, you apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Encrusted With Frost</LSTag>.
Glacial Bellow
During combat, you exude an icy area which deals Cold damage to enemies within [1] of you, equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag>.
Glacial Bellow

Affected creature is surrounded by an icy area which deals Cold damage to enemies within [1] of them, equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag>. The area persists for as long as they remain enraged.
Tundral Strike

Upon being damaged by an enemy, you may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_TundralStrike">Tundral Strike</LSTag>, dealing damage to all enemies in a line toward them and inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for one turn.
Tundral Strike

Upon being damaged by an enemy, retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_TundralStrike">Tundral Strike</LSTag>, dealing damage to all enemies in a line toward them and inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> for one turn.
Frozen Hellscape
Upon rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, your target will immediately become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROZEN">Frozen</LSTag>.
Giant's Blood
You carry the blood of Giants, invoking their might and staggering size alike by drawing strength from the same primordial forces that fuel them.
Rage: Giant's Blood
Enrage and drastically increase in both size and musculature.
Rage: Giant's Blood

Affected creature has drastically increased in both size and musculature, improving all of their physical capabilities and causing them to deal an additional [1] damage with all Melee Weapon Attacks and while unarmed.

In addition, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.
Head Over Heels
While enraged, you gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BootOfTheGiants">Stormheel</LSTag>.
Stormheel
Brutally kick a creature [1] away from you. Your increased size allows you to move creatures far heavier than what would typically be possible.
Cloudreach
While enraged, you gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_MightyImpel">Mighty Impel</LSTag>.
Mighty Impel
Pick up and throw a creature or object. Your increased size allows you to move creatures far heavier than what would typically be possible.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The target cannot be thrown if it is Gargantuan in size.
Poisebreaker

Upon making a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> while enraged, you deal damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag> in a [1] area. This can be toggled at any time.
Frontline Backbreaker

Upon using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BootOfTheGiants">Stormheel</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_MightyImpel">Mighty Impel</LSTag> to displace an enemy, they become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GIANT_STAGGERED">Staggered</LSTag>. After Staggering another creature, you are able to immediately dive to their location, smashing your weapon down upon them. This followup action cannot miss.
Staggered
Affected creature is vulnerable to a guaranteed followup attack from the Barbarian that applied this status.
Frontline Backbreaker
Dive toward a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GIANT_STAGGERED">Staggered</LSTag> creature, smashing your weapon down upon them. This action cannot miss.
Towering Blows
While enraged, all damage rolls are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against creatures that are Large or smaller.
Titanic Strength

While enraged, dealing damage to another creature will always knock them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. In addition, your <LSTag Tooltip="TwoHanded">Two-Handed Weapons</LSTag> are now considered to be <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag>, allowing you to dual-wield them.
Hellslayer
The heat of the Hells roils within you, ready to make itself known in sudden bursts of anger.
Path of Ferocity
You exist as a thing of nightmares - lopsided heaps of entrails thrown indescriminately marking your passing.
Stonebreaker
Able to crush stone between your mere fingers, you've shouldered your rage as an insurmountable source of strength and resilience.
Wild Soul
Rage: Wild Soul

A magical energy roils inside of you, ready to erupt. You are able to cast Spells, even while enraged. Additionally, Spells you cast at level one or higher have the potential to trigger a positive surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>.
Rage: Wild Soul

Succumb to a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_MAGIC">Rage</LSTag> that releases all the magic roiling inside of you. Deal [1] additional damage with <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeapon">Improvised Weapons</LSTag>, and when <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">Throwing</LSTag> objects or creatures. This type of Rage allows for you to continue casting Spells.
Rage: Wild Soul

Affected creature deals an additional [1] damage with Melee Weapon Attacks, Improvised Weapons, and when Throwing objects or creatures.

Additionally, this creature has Resistance to physical damage, as well as Advantage on Strength based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

Spells may continue to be cast during this type of Rage, and will potentially trigger a positive surge of Wild Magic when cast at level one or higher.
Chaotic Roar

Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_MAGIC">Enraging</LSTag>, you immediately experience a barbarous surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>. Your fury malforms the weave within, causing alterations within the surge that lead to new and unique effects.
Unstable Backlash
Upon taking damage, your aggressor may experience a negative surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>.
Chance Surge

Upon rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, your target immediately experiences a negative surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.
Wild Bloodlust
Upon landing a killing blow, you immediately experience a positive surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.
Tenacious Chaos
Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_MAGIC">Enraging</LSTag>, all allies within [1] immediately experience a positive surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>.
Tempered Furies

Your ferocity in battle exudes a potent air of death.
An abject horror to all who would behold you.
Barbarous Assault
While enraged, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all damage rolls.
Brutal Critical
Upon rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, roll an additional damage die.
Danger Sense
Gain the ability to forcibly succeed any <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> at the cost of one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Rage">Rage Charges</LSTag>.
Danger Sense
Forcibly succeed any <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Death Glare
Use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> in order to potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidate</LSTag> a target.
Eyes of Fury
Menace an enemy and attempt to instil a great sense of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidation</LSTag> within them.
Faceoff

If an enemy damages you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidate</LSTag> them.
If an enemy damages you, attempt to instil a great sense of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidation</LSTag> within them.
Furious Criticals
While enraged, the number you need in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by one.
Lands Stride

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> no longer slows you down. While enraged, you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WATER_WALK_BARBARIAN">Water Walk</LSTag>.
Overwhelming Power
When dealing damage while enraged, you ignore all physical <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag>.
Peak Physicality

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. In addition, your Strength is increased by [1].
Rage of the Mountain
While enraged, you also become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE_BARBARIAN">Enlarged</LSTag>.
Rage of the Undefeated

While below 25% of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you may make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Rage of the Undefeated

Affected creature may make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> using their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. This condition persists while under 25% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Rage of the Undefeated
Make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Raging Vitality
While enraged, recover +1d6 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> per turn.
Relentless Endurance

Upon starting your turn while below half of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> you receive total damage <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> until the beginning of your next turn. This may occur once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Relentless Endurance
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to all forms of damage.
Rip and Tear

Once per turn, landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> causes enemies within [1] of your target to potentially become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidated</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.
Rooted in Anger

At the beginning of any combat encounter, you enrage as a free action. At the end of any combat encounter, if still enraged, you regain one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Rage">Rage Charge</LSTag>.
Tempered Retaliation

While enraged, gain the ability to immediately retaliate upon taking damage, spending your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against your aggressor.
Tempered Retaliation
While enraged, immediately retaliate upon taking damage, making an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against your aggressor.
Terrifying Bellow
Upon becoming enraged, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INTIMIDATING_PRESENCE">Intimidate</LSTag> all enemies within [1].
Unstoppable Beast
Your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> increases by 2 for each level you have gained.
Unrelenting Rampage
Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, immediately restore +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.
Unstoppable Force
While enraged, all successful Melee and Throw based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> have a chance to leave your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
